paper_title.en: A systematic review of sodium-glucose cotransporter 2 inhibitors and renal profiles among Japanese patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus.

description.en: BACKGROUND: We conducted a systematic review and meta-analysis to summarize the available literature and comprehensively appraise the renal profiles of sodium-glucose cotransporter 2 inhibitors (SGLT2i) in Japanese patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM). METHODS: The electronic databases MEDLINE, Ichushi-web, and ClinicalTrials.gov were searched for studies without language restrictions from their inception until 20 July 2023 and CENTRAL until 21 September 2021. Studies were included if they were double-masked randomized controlled trials (RCTs) (1) including Japanese patients with T2DM aged > 18 years who received SGLT2i or a placebo, (2) reporting at least one renal outcome of serum creatinine or the estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR), and (3) with a follow-up of > 12 weeks. Cross-over and open label trials were excluded. The risk of bias based on the Cochrane risk-of-bias tool for randomized trials (RoB 2) was appraised. We computed the weighed mean difference with 95%CI for each renal outcome and used a random-effects model (inverse variance method). RESULTS: We ultimately retrieved 13 RCTs including 2687 individuals in our review. The durations of RCTs ranged between 12 and 104 weeks. Only one trial had a longer duration of more than one year. Ten out of 13 RCTs reported serum creatinine, while nine included eGFR. Serum creatinine and eGFR were slightly worse with SGLT2i than with a placebo [mean difference 0.01 (95%CI 0.00 to 0.02) mg/dL, p = 0.002, mean difference - 1.30 (95%CI -2.23 to -0.37) mL/min/1.73 m2, p = 0.006, respectively]. Merged results revealed insignificant heterogeneity (I2 < 30%). CONCLUSION: These results suggest that SGLT2i slightly worsens serum creatinine and eGFR in Japanese patients with T2DM. However, since the durations of most RCTs were short, the effects of eGFR in particular may be transient. Further evidence is needed from rigorous studies that focus on renal outcomes with a longer duration to confirm the present results.

paper_title.ja: 近年の日本の医薬品市場動向とCubixx®システムの有用性についての検討

description.ja: 日本における近年の医薬品市場の動向と当施設での医薬品購入状況を調査し、当施設におけるCubixxシステムの利用状況を評価した。日本の医薬品生産金額総額は年次に対して高い相関をもって有意に増加しており、スペシャリティ医薬品に該当する条件を備えた高額かつ非室温保存条件注射薬の上市件数の増加が大きく影響していると推察された。当施設でも近年新規薬価収載品目を多く輩出する薬効分類品目で、高額かつ非室温保存条件である注射薬が医薬品管理の重点対象の多くを占めており、医薬品の廃棄リスクや人的負担の軽減においてCubixxシステムの有用性が示唆された。日本市場の傾向と類似して医療機関においてもスペシャリティ医薬品に対する医薬品管理業務の重要性が高まっており、Cubixxシステムが機能する条件がそろっていると考えられた。

paper_title.ja: 飛散したロイケリン®散10％の環境曝露に配慮した清掃処理法-調剤現場での実施例-
paper_title.en: 飛散したロイケリン®散10％の環境曝露に配慮した清掃処理法-調剤現場での実施例-

description.ja: ロイケリン散10%は、メルカプトプリン(以下、6-MP)を含む経口抗がん剤であり、分包調剤時の飛散による環境曝露が問題となる。我々はロイケリン散10%調剤後、分包機周囲環境において、中性洗剤をつけたスポンジで水洗いする清掃(以下、水洗い清掃)を行ってきた。残存6-MP測定をした結果、十分な水洗い清掃効果は示されたが、水洗い清掃の際に洗い場等の内部環境を汚染し、かつ、その洗浄水はすべて下水へ流れて外部環境汚染をしていることが示唆された。今回、6-MP分包調剤後にアルコール含有タオルで2回丁寧に清拭した部位では6-MPがほとんど検出されず、清拭後のアルコール含有タオルに次亜塩素酸Na含有スプレーを噴霧すると、6-MPは6-MP S-S dimerに効率良く誘導されることが確認できた。これらの結果より、6-MPの環境曝露に配慮した清掃処理法としては、アルコール含有タオルによる最低2回の丁寧な清拭と次亜塩素酸Na処理後の燃焼廃棄が強く推奨される。(著者抄録)

paper_title.ja: Optimal Erythrocyte Ribavirin Level to Reduce the Risk of Anemia and Obtain an Early Virological Response in Patients with Chronic Hepatitis C Caused by Genotype 1b Infection
paper_title.en: Optimal Erythrocyte Ribavirin Level to Reduce the Risk of Anemia and Obtain an Early Virological Response in Patients with Chronic Hepatitis C Caused by Genotype 1b Infection
Lower doses of 6-mercaptopurine/azathioprine bring enough clinical efficacy and therapeutic concentration of erythrocyte 6-mercaptopurine metabolite in Japanese IBD patients

description.en:
Background: Although 6-mercaptopurine (6-MP) and azathioprine (AZA) are prescribed at lower doses, their efficacy in patients with inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) in Japan is comparable to that in Europe/America. However, there has been no report concerning the measurement of erythrocyte 6-thioguanine nucleotides (6-TGN), which is an active metabolite of 6-MP or AZA, in Japanese IBD patients. This study was designed to elucidate the pharmacokinetic-pharmacodynamic properties of 6-MP and AZA in Japanese patients by measurement of erythrocyte 6-TGN level. Methods: 134 adult patients (99 males
 35 females) with IBD (75 ulcerative colitis
 59 Crohn's disease) who had been receiving a constant dose of 6-MP or AZA for three months or longer were enrolled. Erythrocyte 6-TGN levels were measured using the low-pressure gradient HPLC method, and correlated with treatment efficacy. The genetic polymorphism of thiopurine methyltransferase (TPMT) genotype was also assessed. Results: The mean erythrocyte 6-TGN level (mean ± SD) was 342.3 ± 220.9 pmol/8 × 108RBC, which was supposed to be therapeutic concentration, although the mean daily doses of 6-MP and AZA were no more than 29.8 ± 9.9 mg/day of 6-MP equivalent. However, all patients were identified with the wild type of TPMT genotype. There was no significant difference in the mean 6-TGN levels between patients in remission and no-remission group. The mean 6-TGN level was significantly higher in the once-daily administration group than three times-daily group. Conclusion: Thirty mg/day of 6-MP or 50 mg/day of AZA, once-daily oral administration in Japanese IBD patients was sufficient to achieve the therapeutic target level of 6-TGN in Europeans/Americans. © 2008 European Crohn's and Colitis Organisation.

paper_title.ja: C型慢性肝炎に対するリバビリン併用療法の副作用予測因子の検討：貧血回避のための赤血球脆弱度の有用性
paper_title.en: C型慢性肝炎に対するリバビリン併用療法の副作用予測因子の検討：貧血回避のための赤血球脆弱度の有用性

description.ja:
インターフェロン（IFN）とリバビリン（RBV）の併用療法を行っているC型慢性肝炎の患者13例において，副作用である貧血を未然に回避するため，RBV投与前赤血球脆弱度が貧血を予測する指標となり得るかを検討した．投与前の赤血球脆弱度と，RBV投与後4週目の赤血球中RBVリン酸化体濃度には負の相関があり（r=－0.809, p<0.01），投与前脆弱度が低いほど，治療開始後，赤血球中にRBVリン酸化体が蓄積されることが示唆された．また，投与前脆弱度と，投与後4週目までのHb変化率に正の相関があり（r=0.784 p<0.05），投与前脆弱度0.57未満の患者では，0.57以上の患者に比べて4週目までのHb低下率が有意に大きかった（p<0.05）．
本研究により，治療開始前の赤血球脆弱度が貧血を予測する有用な指標となることが示唆された．
description.en:
In 13 patients undergoing interferon (IFN)-ribavirin (RVB) combination therapy for chronic hepatitis C, we evaluated whether the osmotic fragility of red blood cells before treatment (pretreatment red blood cell fragility) is useful for a predictive index to avoid anemia, an adverse effect of the treatment. A negative correlation was observed between the pretreatment red blood cell fragility and red cell-phosphorylated RBV concentration in Week 4 of treatment (r=-0.809, p<0.01), suggesting that more phosphorylated RBV is accumulated in red blood cells after the beginning of treatment as the pretreatment red blood cell fragility is lower. Also, a positive correlation was noted between the pretreatment red blood cell fragility and rate of Hb reduction until Week 4 (r=0.784, p<0.05), and the rate of Hb reduction was significantly greater in patients in whom the pretreatment red blood cell fragility was less than 0.57 than in those in whom it was 0.57 or higher (p<0.05).
Thus the osmotic fragility of red blood cells before the beginning of treatment is considered to be a useful predictive index of anemia.
